overviewMsg: Please log in to see all metrics
instruct1: Ensure that the CSV data is properly formatted
instruct2: Each column should be separated by a comma
instruct3: Column names should match the metric's column names exactly
instruct4: Data types should be consistent with the metric's column types
instruct5: Do not leave any required fields empty
instruct6: Do not leave spaces between columns
instruct7: Timestamp format must be text string such as <1/>2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z
logoutQ: Are you sure you want to log out?
deleteMetricConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete metric "{{metricName}}"
insertError:
Error inserting data.
Please check the given instructions and try again.
